data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: The pizza is always very great. The service is always excellent. It is always very quick and very tasty. Whenever I am hungry for pizza, I definitely choose fire flour!

data.title: Best Pizza around
data.text: They have Amazing pizza. The Perfect crust.  Simple but so tasty. Our favorite pizza around!!! We have our out of state visitors always try Fireflour!

data.title: Order your pizza at the pub
data.text: We sat over at the pub attached to the restaurant and ordered our pizzas, which they will bring over.  We must have caught them on an off night because my order got really mixed up, but when it finally came, it was delicious.

data.title: Best pizza in North Dakota!
data.text:
I am a pizza snob (my wife is from Napoli and I was stationed there for 3 years) and I must say...
Best pizza in North Dakota by far! We traveled down from Minot just to come here to try the pizza! The fact that they use Caputo 00 flour and the hand-made mozarella is amazing! They also use some of the best prosciutto available in the USA from La Quercia in Iowa! 

The gelato was also fantastic! Just like what I had in Italy for years! The staff were friendly and answered all the questions I had regarding their methods and products. I recommend this place to anyone who has EVER been to Italy and misses a true Italian pizza!

To the owners: Thank you for bringing a piece of heaven to North Dakota! Grazie mille per la pizza!

data.title: Fantastic wood fired pizza
data.text: Convenient and quaint location in downtown Bismarck, Fireflour is home to unique and wonderful wood fired pizza made quickly while you wait. Fresh and tasty ingredients, with a lovely variety of meats, cheeses and veggies for every palate. Only drawback is seating space, but it's really not an issue as they will gladly suggest that you take a seat in the brew-pub next door and place your pizza order there. They even delivered to our table!

data.title: Pizza and more
data.text: My friend and I stopped in at Fireflour pizza and we were absolutely taken back at how wonderful this restaurant is. I definitely will be back again when I'm in town. He had a salad starter and we shared and we shared  the olive appetizers. Service was fantastic. When our two personal pizzas arrived, we thought there's no way we could finish them, but surprise, surprise we both finished them. The crust was fantastic.  A few pints from the brew pub next door made it a complete meal. This is a can't miss folks.

data.title: Bottomless wine? Yes!
data.text: This pizza is phenomenal.  So good that I almost went back a second time during my trip.  A friend and I split one of the 12-in pizzas and it was enough - but I could have eaten one all by myself.  It left me wanting more, for sure.  Luckily, we both had side salads (that were delicious).  I have to mention the bottomless wine, the chosen red was really good. Really great prices.

data.title: Excellent!
data.text: A really great pizza Neapolitan style! I'm Italian and this is the best pizza ever had outside of my country. Also salads are very good and the gelato is high standard except for the fact that is a little too sugary to my taste.

data.title: Limited menu but great pizza
data.text: The menu is small, pizza combinations are unique but the 3 we had were delish! No other choices so your whole party needs to agree to have pizza. Service was very good.

data.title: Best pizza I've ever had!
data.text: They serve neopolitan pizza, which is different from your standard greasy stuff (which I also love, but this is better).  The crust is so fluffy and delicious!  Bonus: they have a coffee, wine and gelato bar.  It's like these people just understand what I need!

data.title: Casual date night
data.text: My husband and I enjoyed personal pan pizzas for a quick date night. The restaurant is casual, small like a café, but comfortable. Delicious pizza and beer options at a reasonable price. We found some of the topping options to be unorthodox.

data.title: Average Pizza
data.text: Trendy Hip and ok Food. The Pizza was fresh and looks great but had better before. The base got soggy  and the sauce was very thin.

data.title: Crust, sauces, and toppings are all outstanding
data.text: This low key pizza place downtown offers both indoor and outdoor seating. The quality of the ingredients is first rate, and the combinations of toppings are very creative. We had the Americano and the Siciliano and enjoyed both. The salad was also good. Service was very friendly, and there was aside selection of beers and wines to choose from.

data.title: Pizza and Gelato
data.text: Had pizza and salad from here while enjoying beers in the Laughing Sun Brewery.  Then went into the store after leaving the Brewery and got some gelato for dessert.  All three of us enjoyed the food and dessert from here.

data.title: Interesting pizza selections
data.text: If you're looking for a new experience in pizza, this may be the place for you. But if you are looking for pizza, you may want to look elsewhere. The pizzas are rather small, quite expensive, but they are tasty.

data.title: Fantastic food
data.text: Love this place!!  The pizza is amazing!  It serves real Italian style (thin crust) pizza.  The quality ingredients and flavor combinations will exceed your expectations.  Hands down the best pizza place in Bismarck!

data.title: Impressive food and service
data.text: The quality of the crust on the 12" pizzas we ate here was really comparable only to the best pizza I ate in Rome.  The gelato seemed small, but appearances are deceptive and the rich flavor erupted in my mouth like a celebration.  But as good as the food was, the friendly service was the best part.  Now I know why the place was packed!

data.title: Great pizza and a nice streetside patio
data.text: Excellent Neapolitan pizza and a good beer selection. Pizzas might be a little pricey ($14-$15), but they are SO good!

data.title: Awesome Food and Service!
data.text: With my sister from SD visiting, we went downtown Bismarck to shop and stopped for lunch at Fireflour Pizza for pizza and a beer. The owner was the waitress and answered all of our questions and made recommendations etc...it was a great visit!!

data.title: Yummy
data.text: Had one of their pizzas on a Thursday at Urban event. It was delicious.  Perfect thickness to the crust.
